Name: Just in Slime
About the game: A lewd cooking game where you mix potions to make the best slimes! You open your sexy shop and sell your slimes to an infinite queue of customers. Take a moment to enjoy their lewd performances or customize your place! Features Play an endless cooking game Create slimes combining potions Unlock sex positions Watch them having fun Many furry characters will visit your place Clean, customize, decorate your place with the store
